name: 12protons Consulting
body:
###Break the barrier into mobile solutions
If you offer an innovative service or product to your customers, let us help you reach out to them in new and exciting ways. Android applications allow users to connect to your business using their Facebook or Twitter accounts, remove purchase barriers by offering mobile payments for services, and much more.


###Streamline business processes

Tasks involving filling out countless paper forms or running to and from a computer are prone to errors, stress your employees, and waste resources. Android tools engineered specifically to your business processes can cut out the busy work and let your employees focus on what they're good at.


###Triple the effectiveness of your mobile strategy

Worldwide, Android is three times as popular as iOS. If you already have a successful iOS app, let us help you extend your business to Android users as well.

Contact us at 12protons@gmail.com to get started with a free consultation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
